updates.text: [EWL] CLEARED: Track circuit fault cleared at #Commonwealth. Train services are returning to normal speed.
[EWL] UPDATE: Due to an earlier track circuit fault at #Commonwealth, pls add 25 mins train travel time from #JooKoon to #TiongBahru.
[EWL]: Due to an earlier track circuit fault at #Commonwealth, pls add 20 mins train travel time from #JooKoon to #Commonwealth.
[EWL]: Due to a track circuit fault at #Commonwealth, pls add 15 mins train travel time from #JooKoon to #Commonwealth.
